versos: (easier) Matthew 19:24 - "Again I tell you, it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for someone who is rich to enter the kingdom of God.";;;
(eagles) Isaiah 40:31 - "but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.";;;
(wings) Psalm 91:4 - "He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.";;;
(pisgah) Deuteronomy 3:27 - Go up to the top of pisgah and lift up your eyes to the west and north and south and east
(jeshimon) Isaiah 43:19 - "Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.";;;
(bounds) Psalm 104:9 - "You set a boundary they cannot cross; never again will they cover the earth.";;;
(trumpet) 1 Thessalonians 4:16 - For the Lord himself will come down from heaven
(condemn) John 3:17 - For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world
(ascended) "And he led them out as far as Bethany, and lifting up his hands he blessed them. While he blessed them, he parted from them and was carried up into heaven." - Luke 24:50-51;;;
(graven) Exodus 20:4 - "You shall not make for yourself an idol in the form of anything in heaven above or on the earth beneath or in the waters below.";;;

(jealous) Exodus 20:5 - "You shall not bow down to them or worship them; for I, the Lord your God, am a jealous God, punishing the children for the sin of the parents to the third and fourth generation of those who hate me.";;;
(shewing) 1 Timothy 4:12 - "Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.";;;
(gates) Psalm 24:7 - "Lift up your heads, O gates; and be lifted up, O ancient doors, that the King of glory may come in.";;;
(hallowed) Matthew 6:9 - "Our Father which art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.";;;
(commit) Psalm 37:5 - "commit your way to the Lord; trust in him and he will act.";;;

(covet) Exodus 20:17 - "You shall not covet your neighbors house. You shall not covet your neighbors wife, or his male or female servant, his ox or donkey, or anything that belongs to your neighbor.";;;
(noise) Psalm 100:1 - "Make a joyful noise unto the Lord, all ye lands.";;;
